title: Ben Dragon's - Child of the State
description:
This is a supplemental Audio Lecture to Ben Dragons book AMFH and this one is called -Child of the State-.


Ben Dragon offers great insight into what a the term "Child of the State" really means. He goes beyond what is meant by the legal term and brings it into our homes.

This is not a lecture on the legalities of "child of the state" but focuses on the term as a whole and what the agenda is in trying to bring this out.


-------

While this is a supplement to his book "A Manual For Humanity", I'm quite sure that everyone will find this stuff well worth listening to! I know I certainly do!


His website is at;

                    clarity.sf-w.net



Ben Dragons email address is:

                       b-c at sf-w.net




ThomasC
